name: Rubble Town Rumble: VR
description:
Play as Angus the Dwarfslayer, who has traveled to Rubbletown on some non-descript journey and went a little overboard on the drinking. Now all the dwarves there are sober and infuriated. Kick, slash, and destroy your way through these beardy foes! 

Drink the Ale on the fountain to bring on the dwarves!

Ben Hunsicker & David Rozell: VR Port Programming

Play the original!
